description: Meet Kinetic HD: a bigger, faster, stronger style than it ever was before. Made from 4-way stretch fabric, this Semi-Compression pair is designed for a wide range of sport and fitness activites. Equipped with an evolved version of the BallPark Pouch™ – which has been modified to improve fit and function – guys will experience an elevated level of comfort.
name: Saxx Underwear Kinetic Light-Compression Mesh Long Leg, 8" Inseam - Mens
